item.description:
• 6:30 - 7:00: Meet and Greet 
  • 7:00 - 8:00: Production Technique Open Discussion - Tell us how you work, find out how other people work, compare and contrast. 
  • 8:00 - 9:00: Dinner and General Discussion - Pizza and drinks and break into small discussion and shmoozing. This is your chance to start new projects, find someone to collaborate with, share your work or just chill out with like-minded people.

If anyone wants to suggest other ideas, that's fine.
item.name: Meetup for the MetroWest denizens
